title: Renewable Energy Investments Reach Record High in 2025
summary: Global investments in renewable energy reached $750 billion in 2025, marking a 15% increase from the previous year as countries race to meet climate goals.

title: New Policy Framework Targets Zero-Carbon Grid by 2035
summary: Government introduces comprehensive policy package with incentives for renewables and storage to accelerate the transition to a carbon-free electricity system.

title: Breakthrough in Long-Duration Energy Storage Technology
summary: Researchers develop new iron-air battery technology capable of storing electricity for 100+ hours at 1/10th the cost of lithium-ion batteries.

title: Oil Majors Accelerate Transition to Clean Energy
summary: Leading oil and gas companies announce plans to allocate 40% of capital expenditure to renewable energy and low-carbon technologies by 2030.

title: Smart Grid Deployment Reduces Outages by 45%
summary: Implementation of AI-powered grid management system has significantly reduced outages and improved resilience during extreme weather events.

title: Climate Law Enforcement Reaches New Milestone
summary: Environmental agencies have issued record fines to companies violating emissions standards, signaling stronger enforcement of climate regulations.
